title: My first farewell
creator_credit: Angela Jones, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Angela Jones recalls a time when her daily activities caused her to feel a sense of shame and self consciousness that she would never like to experience again.
creator_credit_for_label: Angela Jones, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
